short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks Roblox profiles to see if users are in a predefined list of individuals or groups and provides reasons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a rather simple extension which helps users to identify potentially malicious Roblox users from a list. It adds a simple, red label in a player's "About Me" section, warning users of the potential risks of dealing with the person in question...

No data is collected from you.

It is primarily used for identifying people who have been conducting activities that are typically break the Roblox TOS but which actions against them are not taken.

You may find the list at: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Avaluate/AvaWeb/refs/heads/main/List.json
